name: Airtable
semantic_context: Read, update, write and delete data from Airtable
natural_language_description: 这是 Airtable 节点。主要用于: Read, update, write and delete data from Airtable

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: airtableApi

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

deprecated.displayName: This type of connection (API Key) was deprecated and can't be used anymore. Please create a new credential of type 'Access Token' instead.
deprecated.name: deprecated
deprecated.natural_language_description: 参数名: This type of connection (API Key) was deprecated and can't be used anymore. Please create a new credential of type 'Access Token' instead.

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: read
available_options: Append (值: append) - Append the data to a table
Delete (值: delete) - Delete data from a table
List (值: list) - List data from a table
Read (值: read) - Read data from a table
Update (值: update) - Update data in a table

application.name: application
application.description: The Airtable Base in which to operate on
application.natural_language_description: 参数名: Base | 作用: The Airtable Base in which to operate on | 默认值: {'mode': 'url', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

table.name: table
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 默认值: {'mode': 'url', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

addAllFields.name: addAllFields
addAllFields.description: Whether all fields should be sent to Airtable or only specific ones
addAllFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Add All Fields | 作用: Whether all fields should be sent to Airtable or only specific ones | 默认值: True

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The name of fields for which data should be sent to Airtable
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: The name of fields for which data should be sent to Airtable | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.description: ID of the record to update
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: ID of the record to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: True

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

downloadAttachments.name: downloadAttachments
downloadAttachments.description: Whether the attachment fields define in 'Download Fields' will be downloaded
downloadAttachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Attachments | 作用: Whether the attachment fields define in 'Download Fields' will be downloaded | 默认值: False

downloadFieldNames.name: downloadFieldNames
downloadFieldNames.description: Name of the fields of type 'attachment' that should be downloaded. Multiple ones can be defined separated by comma. Case sensitive and cannot include spaces after a comma.
downloadFieldNames.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Fields | 作用: Name of the fields of type 'attachment' that should be downloaded. Multiple ones can be defined separated by comma. Case sensitive and cannot include spaces after a comma. | (必填项)

additionalOptions.name: additionalOptions
additionalOptions.description: Additional options which decide which records should be returned
additionalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Options | 作用: Additional options which decide which records should be returned | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - Only data for fields whose names are in this list will be included in the records

filterByFormula (值: None) - A formula used to filter records. The formula will be evaluated for each record, and if the result is not 0, false, "", NaN, [], or #Error! the record will be included in the response.
sort (值: None) - Defines how the returned records should be ordered
view (值: None) - The name or ID of a view in the Stories table. If set, only the records in that view will be returned. The records will be sorted according to the order of the view.

updateAllFields.name: updateAllFields
updateAllFields.description: Whether all fields should be sent to Airtable or only specific ones
updateAllFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update All Fields | 作用: Whether all fields should be sent to Airtable or only specific ones | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: bulkSize (值: None) - Number of records to process at once
ignoreFields (值: None) - Comma-separated list of fields to ignore
typecast (值: None) - Whether the Airtable API should attempt mapping of string values for linked records & select options
